DOC.brief_title: Role Cysteinyl Leukotrienes Pathogenesis Asthma Obesity
DOC.detailed_description: This cross-sectional observational study characterize association obese asthmatic inflammatory mediator cysteinyl leukotrienes . Our hypothesis alter adipokine level obesity result augment cysteinyl leukotriene synthesis play significant role pathogenesis asthma subject .
DOC.criteria: 1865 yr old adult asthma , nonsmoking least one year Healthy nonsmoking adult , age 1865 without asthma Heavy subject BMI > 30 kg/m2 Subjects normal weight ( BMI 2025 kg/m2 ) Subject take antileukotriene therapy ( Singulair , Accolate , Zyflo ) No chronic oral steroid use No recent history infection No recent history flare lung disease
